label: Spirit
info_overview:
Spirit Z-Wave Plus is a Z-Wave radio standard compatible energy-saving radiator thermostat.

FLiRS (Frequently Listening Receiver Slave): Spirit Z-Wave uses FLiRS to provide short latency and short responding times.
info_inclusion: Start Inclusion mode of your primary Z-Wave Controller. Press the Boost-Button. Spirit Z-Wave Plus will show the assigned NodeID.
info_exclusion: Start Exclusion mode of your primary Z-Wave Controller. Now press and hold the boost button of the Spirit Z-Wave Plus for at least 5 seconds.

category_description: Controls on radiators used to heat up rooms

parameters.label: LCD Timeout
parameters.overview:
0: No Timeout LCD always on

5-30: LCD will turn off after 5 to 30 seconds

options.label: system notification
options.overview: Battery status is only reported as a system notification (Notification CC)

options.label: Send battery status unsolicited once a day.

parameters.label: Measured  Temperature report
parameters.overview:
0: Unsolicited Temperature reporting disabled

1-50: report if temperature changed by delta = 0,1°C ... 5,0 °C

default 5: report on delta T = 0,5°C

parameters.label: Valve opening  percentage report
parameters.overview:
0: Unsolicited valve opening percentage reporting disabled.

1-100: report if valve opening changed by delta = 1% ... 100%

parameters.label: Temperature Offset
parameters.overview:
-50 - +50: Offsets the measured temp by-5,0°C – (+)5,0°C

128: External temp sensor will be used for regul.

options.label: Ext temp sensor be used for regul

associations.label: Lifeline
associations.description: Spirit Z-Wave Plus can only be associated with the Z-Wave controller.
associations.overview:
Commands:

BATTERY_REPORT, DEVICE_RESET_LOCALLY_NOTIFICATION, THERMOSTAT_MODE_REPORT, THERMOSTAT_SETPOINT_REPORT, NOTIFICATION_REPORT, PROTECTION_REPORT, SENSOR_MULTILEVEL_REPORT, SWITCH_MULTILEVEL_REPORT

commandclass.name: NO_OPERATION
commandclass.label: No Operation - used for PINGing a device.

commandClasses.config: Provides or sets the valve opening degree of the valve Controlling  the valve opening degree requires manufacturer specific mode

options.name: Heat
options.overview: Switches into comfort heating mode. The room temperature will be kept at the configured comfortable level.

commandClasses.config: Allows to configure the desired room temperature

channels.name: thermostat_setpoint
channels.label: Setpoint (heat)
channels.overview:
Precision 0,1 and 2
Scale Celsius and Fahrenheit
Temp. Range 8°C-28°C

channels.name: thermostat_setpoint
channels.label: Setpoint (energy heat)
channels.overview:
Precision 0,1 and 2
Scale Celsius and Fahrenheit
Temp. Range 8°C-28°C

commandClasses.config: Informs the Z-Wave Controller that the device was factory reset
Identifies the device as a Z-Wave Plus Device
Allows to configure the device settings
Informs the controller about critical system events/errors
Provides information about Manufacturer and Product
Used to alter the rf-power(required by Z-Wave).
Allows to lock the device (child protection).
Allows Over the Air Update of the device.
Returns the current battery level of the device.
Allows to associate with other Z-Wave devices.

xml.xml:
Overview

Spirit Z-Wave Plus is a Z-Wave radio standard compatible energy-saving radiator thermostat.

FLiRS (Frequently Listening Receiver Slave): Spirit Z-Wave uses FLiRS to provide short latency and short responding times.


Inclusion Information

Start Inclusion mode of your primary Z-Wave Controller. Press the Boost-Button. Spirit Z-Wave Plus will show the assigned NodeID.


Exclusion Information

Start Exclusion mode of your primary Z-Wave Controller. Now press and hold the boost button of the Spirit Z-Wave Plus for at least 5 seconds.

]]> RadiatorControl COMMAND_CLASS_SWITCH_MULTILEVEL COMMAND_CLASS_SWITCH_MULTILEVEL COMMAND_CLASS_SENSOR_MULTILEVEL;type=TEMPERATURE COMMAND_CLASS_SENSOR_MULTILEVEL;type=TEMPERATURE COMMAND_CLASS_THERMOSTAT_MODE COMMAND_CLASS_PROTECTION COMMAND_CLASS_THERMOSTAT_SETPOINT;type=HEATING COMMAND_CLASS_THERMOSTAT_SETPOINT;type=HEATING_ECON COMMAND_CLASS_ALARM;type=SYSTEM COMMAND_CLASS_ALARM;type=POWER_MANAGEMENT COMMAND_CLASS_BATTERY Eurotronics Spirit 0148 0003:0001,0003:0003 710 Provides access to basic functionality Provides or sets the valve opening degree of the valve Controlling the valve opening degree requires manufacturer specific mode Provides the measured room temperature Configures the operation mode Allows to configure the desired room temperature Allows to group associations Informs the Z-Wave Controller that the device was factory reset Identifies the device as a Z-Wave Plus Device Allows to configure the device settings Informs the controller about critical system events/errors Provides information about Manufacturer and Product Used to alter the rf-power(required by Z-Wave). Allows to lock the device(child protection). Allows Over the Air Update of the device. Returns the current battery level of the device. Allows to associate with other Z-Wave devices. Returns information about the Firmware. Allows encrypted Z-Wave Communication 1 setup link LCD Invert 0
